description:
Newly renovated, basement guest suite with private entrance, kitchenette (no stove), king size bed, full bath, and a sofa that converts to a full size bed for additional guests.   

Our house is located in the Prospect Lefferts Gardens section of Brooklyn, a quiet neighborhood with a great location -- close to four different subway lines, Prospect Park, and a number of cafes, restaurants and stores.

Newly renovated, basement guest suite  -- private entrance, king size bed, kitchenette (coffee maker, microwave, refrigerator), bathroom with shower (no bathtub), sofa that converts to a full size bed for additional guests.

Private, exterior entrance down a set of stairs -- it is not handicap accessible.

Our family lives upstairs, and we are happy to answer any questions you may have.  We will meet you when you arrive to give you the key.  After that, you can ring our bell, phone or text if you need anything.

Our house is located in the Prospect Lefferts Gardens section of Brooklyn. It's a quiet neighborhood with great access to the subway, and near Prospect Park, the Brooklyn Botanic Garden, Brooklyn Art Museum, and a number of cafes, restaurants and stores.

We are close the the Sterling St 2/5 subway station (5 minute walk) and the Prospect Park B/Q/Shuttle (10-15 minute walk).     Depending on where you want to go, it's a 40 - 60 minute subway ride to Manhattan tourist destinations.

Depending on traffic, it's a 30 - 70 minute taxi ride to each of the major airports: 
   LGA: 40 min - 1 hour
   JFK:  30 min - 1 hour
   Newark:  40 min - 1 hour+

We are a family of 4, with two young and energetic boys.  Also, steam heat can be noisy in winter.   Please let us know of any issues and we will be as sensitive about noise as we can.  Our kids are in bed by 8pm, but please be aware we are up early (7am) to get ready for work and school.
name: Newly Renovated Private Studio near Prospect Park
review: Очень комфортное, уютное и чистое жильё! 5-10мин до станции метро и 2 минуты до магазинов и ландроматов. В апартах есть все необходимое и даже больше! Чистое постельное белье, белые полотенца, зубная паста, шампунь, в общем лучше, чем в отеле! Прибыли мы поздно вечером и были приятно удивлены, что хозяева побеспокоились и приготовили все необходимое для перекуса! Рекомендую данные апартаменты! Ник и Марго, Спасибо огромное!
